url.description: URL leading to further information about your conference

code-of-conduct.description: URL to your code of conduct

next-date.description: The next time your conference is taking place

start.description: The day your conference starts in YYYY-MM-DD format

end.description: The day your conference ends in YYYY-MM-DD format

location.description: Information about where to place your conference on the map

coordinates.description: Long/Lat values of where to place your community. ATTENTION: Long comes first, this is different from how GMaps/OSM show them

icon.description: The relative url to an icon in 64x64 PNG format. Should be places in /target/icons/
